reviews.review:
Parece un acceso anticipado, sin embargo...

Lo que mantiene a este juego con vida a mi parecer es la idea como tal del mismo, es un buen juego, y es divertido jugar, pero:

Menús mal acabados, bugs por todas partes, caidas, lags de los servidores, fallos en la partida... Es un videojuego lleno de fallos, aunque intentan arreglarlo, pero para arreglar una flor rompen tres asesinos... pero en fin, si el juego te gusta, adelante, compralo, pero ten en cuenta que a dia de hoy, noviembre de 2019, el juego está fallando muchisimo.

Los pros como dije antes es la idea de juego, la comunidad, que cada 2 x 3 hay nuevo contenido, eventos, tiene una rama de progresión que es genial, muy buenas habilidades y muchos personajes, con amigos es mejor aun... una pasada en este aspecto. Tambien me gusta destacar que jugar como asesino o superviviente cambia el juego por completo, no tiene nada que ver, mola muchisimo.

Game's pretty neat, as a concept. A game where you can choose to either be a survivor or the killer? Cool!

Mechanics are pretty straightforward, so you don't really need to even play the tutorial to understand the really basic fundamentals. 

The learning curve is a bitch though. I still don't know how to loop properly (you'll know what that is if/when you check out the game), but eh, I'm treating this as a grind game somewhat.

The community can be trash. I've seen more toxic survivors than killers (I play as both, and gosh dang...), and I'd suggest you come into this game with a thick skin. But you do meet some nice people in here too, so, I guess...keep an open mind?

Bugs. There are bugs. I really like the lore, but this game has bugs. Oh well.

The game itself is really nice. There problem is not about that. The real problem is that the game always has updates for some bug fixes but none of them are fixed. The constant errors (for example rank update error, save game error, validate files error) makes this nice game terrible. When I want to play even one single game, which lasts around 10 minutes, I have to spend 20 minutes trying to open the game. There are new killers and survivors which come with the update like once in a month, but for a loooooong time, non of these bugs are fixed. If these bugs are fixed, I strongly recommend playing this game. But unless it is fixed...... thumbs down.

At the moment this game is doing fairly well and I have my hopes up for the developers, the upcoming spirit nerfs support my views that the devs are slowly starting to pay attention to the people in this community with a brain. Sadly if the devs dont realize that what they are doing with exclusives is killing a small very expensive market, the market of buying and selling exclusives; this change rips everyone who purchased an exclusive off as now everyone will be getting these items and they will not be rare or a show of dedication. Me and many others are currently praying that the devs listen to the higher majority of players and decide to cancel this

<- 2019 review, 2021 this game is only fun in a SWF or as a killer against doo-doo survivors comp dbd is fun as always but playing soloQ is aids asf.

it feels like every killer release in the past 2 years has either been boring and derivitive to play as or against

for the past year or two it feels like BHVR is trying to "fix" the most fun part of the game for both sides "chases" by making them more boring and formulaic for both sides
YARRAK GİBİ Bİ OYUN BÜTÜN KATİLLER ALLAH OLMUŞ KAÇILMAYA BİDE UMACI DİYE BİR OROSPU EVLADI VAR ONUN ANASINI SİKEYİM !!!NOT!!!:5 KİŞİ OLMADAN OYNAMAYIN
Pretty fun, but community is toxic like it's 2019

Geniales Spielkonzept mit gut inszenierten Horror-Elementen und leicht erlernbarem Gameplay ^^
Zwar wird das Ganze noch von einigen Bugs durchzogen - diese gehen von ungefährlich(z.B Spieler wird bei Schlag vom Killer plötzlich gegen einen Baum geworfen) bis hin zu Game-breaking (z.B. letzter Überlebender kann den Ausgang nicht verlassen) und tauchen zwar nicht durchgehend, aber mal ab und zu auf. 
Aber abseits davon kann das Spiel sowohl für Gelegenheits- als auch für Hardcorespieler lange genug Unterhaltung bieten und sieht dank der Unreal Engine dabei auch richtig gut aus.
Definitiv empfehlenswert!
Super fun game. Definitely watch some people play it first though so you know what the heck is going on.
Once I knew what is was doing, it good

I like the atmosphere of the game, and how fun it can be when played with friends. Even playing by yourself can be fun, but only when you are skilled enough and know what to do in certain situations. This game could be a bit more scary, but it is pretty solid. 9/10

Отличная игра, стоит своих денег из-за геймплея и идеи, но на данный момент испугать она нас может только резкими неожиданными действиями и это печально, но разработчики прислушиваются к мнению игроков и активно поддерживают связь со своим сообществом и я верю что рано или поздно игра станет более страшней, чем сейчас.

Este juego no está nada mal, sobre todo si te gustan las películas de terror del género Slasher. He de avisar que aun siendo divertido la comunidad puede hacerte dificil la experiencia debido a su alta tasa de toxicidad, pues como en otros juegos multijugador, una mala partida puede ser muy amarga y no muchos pueden soportar la tentación de desconectarse o criticar al resto de jugadores.
Solo le faltaria otros modos de juego

The game is simple, yet 'hooking'. If you like horror type of hide and seek game which turns into playing tag with the killer. The game has it's flaws when it comes to bugs and being asymmetrical when it, but as long as you acknowledge that the game offers a fun experience. The game is improving, so there has been change to balance the game and add new experiences to the player.

Great game to play with friends.
Some time you find hunters who just camp, that's annoying.
there's no voice chat , if you play with your friends then discord, team speak or something of that sorts have to be used.
ping usually doesn't matter.
i would recommend this game, its lot of fun

Update :
played this game around 130 hrs.

pros : 
frequent updates 
great community
i didnt get any hacker in these 130 hrs
very fun to play

cons :
The mm system is so fkin broken. whenever there is a sale you get matched up with lvl 20 players (new players) even if you are below rank 10 (average players). you can watch ss on my profile.

There are still campers and tunnelers, and nothing can be done about it.

The ranking system is just fked up. you do 3 gens, 2 totem, 5 hook sabotage, loop the killer for 5-6 min all in a sing match, still you will derank, but you unhook 2 people and do nothing, then you will rank up. i really dont understand their logic here, you can make a 2 man team and just farm ranks by unhooking each other.



the game is fun with friends, somewhat irritating with noob randoms, and amazing with good survivors.

Takes a decent amount of time to really learn the mechanics of the game and learn to play well, but I really do like the game a lot. It's kind of addicting, tbh. Lots of different killers and survivors, endless perks and powers that change up game play. There are issues, and the community can be pretty frustrating, but it's worth it... if you're willing to grind it out.
It's a really good game, there is always something to do or a goal to work towards like a free cosmetic.
Не тратьте деньги. Разрабы годами сосут деньги с игроков новыми скинами на персонажей. Баги если и чинят, то только плодя новые. Некоторые проблемы не решаются опять же годами.
